remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 2nd paragraph on p. 114. ` X ` represents t_1.  In their notation, we prove p ` \/ ` t_1 = p ` \/ ` t.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdleme8t.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme8t.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme8t.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme8t.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme8t.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme8t.x $e |- X = ( ( P .\/ T ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme8tN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ T e. A ) -> ( P .\/ X ) = ( P .\/ T ) ) $.
